document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 73''' was released in March/April of 1999. It contained the following article related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Creatures: : [[bandit]] • [[black dragon]] • [[bullywug]] • [[caryatid column]] • [[curst]] • [[darktentacles]] • [[dracolich]] • [[dread]] • [[flying fingers]] • [[gaunt]] • [[ghost]] • [[grandfather plaque]] • [[knight denizen]] • [[meazel]] • [[mudman]] • [[night rider]] • [[obliviax]] • [[sewerm]] • [[skeleton]] • [[skuz]] • [[yuan-ti]]
